articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
In early July, Maker passed the RWA-009 proposal, which approved HV Bank as a new vault type with a $100M initial debt ceiling & targeting $1B in 12 months. 
Are we starting to see Maker actually lending to HV Bank? 👀👇
Learn more about RWA-009 here:
Sébastien Derivaux: Is that @MakerDAO lending to a regulated US bank?
👀👀👀👀👀

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
🏦A Senate bill, the Digital Commodities Consumer Protection Act of 2022, is being introduced today.
TL;DR — the proposal is net positive, but it needs more definition clarity for devs, node operators, & individual traders to prevent overreach.
See @valkenburgh's breakdown👇
Peter Van Valkenburgh: 1/ New Crypto Bill in Senate: read this thread or our post for the full download on what it does and what risks it poses to software developers and individual crypto users.
 https://www.coincenter.org/a-new-senate-bill-focuses-on-cryptocurrency-exchanges-heres-what-developers-and-users-should-keep-an-eye-on/

For all the details, check out the update from @Scalara_xyz. 👇
Scalara: 🔁Scalara announces the results of the July rebalancing of the DeFi Pulse Index.
The DeFi Pulse Index is the leading benchmark of the DeFi sector and available as a single token $DPI by @indexcoop and @SetProtocol.
 https://www.scalara.xyz/blog/july-2022-rebalance-defi-pulse-index

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
The Merge will: 
1️⃣ Directly reduce the issuance of ETH 
2️⃣ Restructure ETH incentives for block production
But does this guarantee that ETH will become deflationary after the Merge?
@Scalara_xyz's Nathan Howard gives his full take in this week's featured guest blog below. ⬇️
